Author: scarletfawn
Text: I know what you mean, one of my best friends is anorexic and triggers me HARD. I hate being in pictures with her but I love her to death and want to spend time with her so I've just gotta push through while working towards my GW...  With that being said, I'm a pretty terrible person and enjoy f.ex. sitting beside people bigger than me. I feel awful that I pay so much attention to other ppl's looks even tho I don't measure their worth that way or consciously pick only certain body type friends...
